title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 80-2.4 - Violations by other persons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 80-2.4 - Violations by other persons

State Regulations

No parent insurer, subsidiary of a parent insurer, or person in a holding company system shall cause a controlled insurer or controlling producer to violate any provision of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
80-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
